department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Boat maintenance and repair service for sea crafts
description: Provide maintenance and repair service for boat hulls, structures and flotation collars as needed.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Information

### Solicitation Title
F3773-230040 - Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) for Boat Maintenance and Repair Services

### Solicitation Reference Number
WS4474256369

### Amendment Number
2

### Solicitation Number
WS4474256369

### Publication Date
June 13, 2024

### Tender Closing Date
July 16, 2024 at 14:00:00

## Procurement Details

### Procurement Category
SRV (Service)

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

### Notice Type
Request for Standing Offers (RFSO)

### Selection Criteria
Price (Lowest Price)

## Requirements

### Goods and Services
Boat maintenance and repair services for hulls, structures, and pneumatic flotation collars for various marine boats, as per Annex A.

### Locations

* Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* Mont-Joli

## Trade Agreements

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

## Contact Information

### Contact Name
Félix-Antoine Carignan, SPAC/PSPC (he/him)

### Contact Email
felix-antoine.carignan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Contracting Entity
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

### End User Entity
Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
